properties.name: Coautores
properties.query: select distinct ?id ?name ?rdftype where{ ?doc <http://purl.org/roh/mirror/bibo#authorList> ?lista. ?lista ?autor <{ENTITY_ID}>.?lista ?autores2 ?id. ?id a ?rdftype. FILTER(?rdftype= <http://purl.org/roh/mirror/foaf#Person>). ?id <http://purl.org/roh/mirror/foaf#name> ?name. filter(?id!=<{ENTITY_ID}>)} limit 5

properties.name: Autor de
properties.query: select distinct ?id ?name ?rdftype where{ ?doc <http://purl.org/roh/mirror/bibo#authorList> ?lista. ?doc <http://purl.org/roh#title> ?name. ?lista ?id <{ENTITY_ID}>. ?doc a ?rdftype filter(?id!=<{ENTITY_ID}>)} limit 5
